name: Dice Roller
content: Dice Roller is a simple app that allows you to roll dice. You can choose the number of dice and the number of sides on each die. It's great for playing board games or role-playing games.

name: Expense Tracker
content: Expense Tracker is a simple app that allows you to track your expenses. You can add expenses, categorize them, and view reports of your spending. It's great for managing your budget and keeping track of your finances.

name: Favorite Places
content: Favorite Places is a simple app that allows you to save your favorite places. You can add locations, categorize them, and view them on a map. It's great for keeping track of places you want to visit or places you frequent.

name: AirMind
content: Talk with any database, and get the information you need. AirMind is a simple app that allows you to connect with any database and get the information you need. You can ask questions, and the app will provide you with the answers. It's great for getting quick information without having to search for it.

name: Birthday Reminder
content: Birthday Reminder is a simple app that allows you to keep track of birthdays. You can add birthdays, set reminders, and view a list of upcoming birthdays. It's great for remembering important dates and keeping in touch with friends and family.
